TITLE: Senior Mechanical Engineer

REPORTS TO: Deputy/Assistant Manager Maintenance

LOCATION: Faisalabad, Pakistan

Rafhan Maize Products Co. Ltd. (Ingredion Incorporated) is hiring Senior Mechanical Engineer, who will be responsible for monitoring and controlling plant operation and maintenance activities.

As Senior Mechanical Engineer, Your Responsibilities Will Include
Delivering safety talk on daily basis before assigning the job to workers to ensure the accident-free environment
Managing available resources to execute the maintenance jobs
Preparing maintenance orders and store issuance requisitions in SAP
Ensuring the corrective and preventive maintenance of all equipment as per schedule
Preparing and evaluating the bills of contractor as per actual scope of work
Preparing, keeping and updating the record of preventive and corrective maintenance
Analyzing the actual requirement of items and amend the store inventory levels
Ensuring the timely preparation of monthly reports related to departmental activities
Ensuring the timely completion of month end closing in SAP
Raising PRs, evaluating QEMs for selection of material, preparing maintenance orders, store issuance requisitions and month end closing in SAP
Observing the ongoing daily activities performed by the workers and making appropriate changes where required for the safe execution of job
Ensuring timely completion of ongoing projects well in allocated budget
Sharing the different way outs with Engineers / Foreman to carryout jobs
Working for the implementation of CSI projects
Assisting seniors to ensure the implementation of company policies and SOPs
Performing all the jobs assigned by the seniors
Working for compliance of company IMS policies to meet the targets
Assisting seniors for the preparation of ISO, SMETA, Regulatory Support Visits and Food audits
Assisting seniors to fulfill the regulatory requirements
This Position Is Well-suited For You If You Have
Good understanding of Chemical, Food or Process Industry
Team management skills
Qualified Candidates Will Have
B.Sc./M.Sc. Mechanical Engineering
Proven multidirectional experience of operation & maintenance of equipment
Knowledge of MS Office, SAP, ERP System, Six Sigma
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

About Us

Rafhan Maize is an affiliate of Ingredion Incorporated, USA which has strong global presence with commercial and manufacturing operations in more than 60 countries of the world. Our strategy is a unique blend of volume growth and operational excellence. We are pursuing tri dimensional strategy to grow organically, geographically and by broadening ingredients portfolio.

If you are inspired by professional challenges and the rewards that come from a high level of performance, then Ingredion (Rafhan Maize) is the company for you. At Ingredion (Rafhan Maize) you can be a member of a globally connected team inspired to achieve great things.

We believe in the power of our people to work together to seize opportunities, overcome obstacles and exceed expectations. Each day, individuals make a meaningful difference in the quality of our products and the success of our technology and operations and, in turn, the quality of life for consumers.

Relocation Available:

No

Posted by
Jarrar Haider
Assistant Manager HR
Send InMail
Main Accountabilities

Planning and designing of complete Public Health, Fire Fighting & HVAC services with support of Senior Members
Doing all necessary design calculations for Mechanical design
Preparation and Review of Public Health, Fire Fighting & HVAC design drawings
Coordinating with Senior Management and Design Team to assure project stability and to meet technical needs of the project
Collaborate cross- with different design teams on various design requirements and improvements
Coordinating with draft persons to prepare mechanical drawings as per design requirements
Producing necessary technical documents including Bill of Quantities (BOQ), Engineer’s Cost Estimate & technical specifications
Responsible for Identification of new technology & its deployment for a modernized and cost-effective solution
Create progress reports to streamline projects and increase efficiency

Qualification & Experience

BSc Mechanical Engineering
0-3 years of Experience (Public Health, Fire Fighting & HVAC System Design)

Job Specific Skills

Self-Motivated & Result Oriented
Excellent communication and Interpersonal skills
Team Player & Problem-Solving Approach
Sound Knowledge of Mechanical Design Codes
Proficient in Mechanical Design softwares

Posted by
Jarrar Haider
Assistant Manager HR
Send InMail
Main Accountabilities

Planning & designing of complete Public Health, Fire Fighting & HVAC services
Providing optimized solutions for building services of the project
Collaborate cross-functionally with different design teams on various design requirements and improvements
Supervise drafting team & Communicating design requirements
Preparation of Design & Tender Documents with Engineer Estimation
Provide guidance to junior design staff and draft personals
Preparing Monthly Progress Reports, Initiating Backlog Clearance, Resolving Bottleneck Mechanical Issues

Qualification & Experience

BS Mechanical Engineering
5+ years of experience (preferably in mechanical design services)

Job Specific Skills

Self-Motivated & Result Oriented
Excellent Interpersonal Skills
Team Player & Problem-Solving Approach
Sound Knowledge of Electrical Design Codes
Proficient in Mechanical Design softwares

TITLE: Boiler Engineer

REPORTS TO: Manager Powerhouse

LOCATION: Jaranwala, Punjab

Rafhan Maize Products Co. Ltd. (Ingredion Incorporated) is hiring Boiler Engineer, who will be responsible for ensuring smooth the operation of Co-gen Plant and other utilities in compliance with company policies and reporting system.

As Boiler Engineer, Your Responsibilities Will Include
Monitoring Boiler Water Level, related pumps and burning system of Boilers in operation at Co-gen and Utilities department
Supervision of coal crushing and conveying system
Supervision of ash handling and conveying system
Preparing the Plant Shift Report and Log Sheet
Checking the quality of boiler feed water, boiler blow down, process water and condensate return periodically during the shift
Ensuring proper function of canal water settling system and tube wells for ground water supply
Controlling the loss due to leakage of steam, water, gas, air, condensate at all the process plants
Closing valve in case of any major leakage of steam, steam condensate, water, gas, furnace oil and air
Ensuring proper working of safety devices at the boiler, air compressors, LPG/SNG plant and the cooling towers
Ensuring efficient operation of wastewater treatment and ensure the compliance of NEQS of effluent water discharge from WWTP
This Position Is Well-suited For You If You Have
Knowledge of Co-generation powerhouse and Utilities operations
Basic computer skills (MS Office); working knowledge of SAP will be preferred
Good written and verbal communication skills; preliminary level English language skills are desirable
Qualified Candidates Will Have
Matric; preferably DAE; 1st Class Boiler Competency Certificate
A few years of experience in the operation and maintenance of coal fired CFB boiler and water softening plant
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status, military status, or disability status.

About Us

Rafhan Maize is an affiliate of Ingredion Incorporated, USA which has strong global presence with commercial and manufacturing operations in more than 60 countries of the world. Our strategy is a unique blend of volume growth and operational excellence. We are pursuing tri dimensional strategy to grow organically, geographically and by broadening ingredients portfolio.

If you are inspired by professional challenges and the rewards that come from a high level of performance, then Ingredion (Rafhan Maize) is the company for you. At Ingredion (Rafhan Maize) you can be a member of a globally connected team inspired to achieve great things.

We believe in the power of our people to work together to seize opportunities, overcome obstacles and exceed expectations. Each day, individuals make a meaningful difference in the quality of our products and the success of our technology and operations and, in turn, the quality of life for consumers.

Relocation Available:

Yes, Within Country

Control building experiences include but are not limited to structural estimations, Structural analysis (STAAD), HVAC proposals
Understanding of building materials, techniques, and processes
Design reviews for Skids including stress analysis of piping and structure
Hands-on experience in piping, instrumentation, and fabrication
Hands-on experience in using ASME / ASTM / AISI and construction-related international codes and standards
Inspection and supervision of project activities in line with project specifications and applicable standards
Vendor and subcontractor management
Integration and testing of the final package as per project specifications
Experience in proposals, tenders, and bidding procedure is a plus
The project, procurement management, and cost-controlling abilities
Excellent skills in technical writing and reporting
Flexible approach to work and ability to adapt

Requirements:

Master's or Bachelors in Mechanical Engineering
Experience: 3 to 5 years
PMP is preferred

Project Engineer (Electrical) will be a part of project execution team BU Transmission Solution in Karachi, which is responsible for execution and completion of Grid Stations projects in line with time, cost and quality requirements.

Project Engineer (Electrical) Support the Project Manager in the execution of the project to achieve completion of the agreed scope within agreed budget, time and accepted quality standards.
Prepare and update project plans and management plans. Ensure plans consider risks and include appropriate mitigations.
Actively communicates with all stakeholders and other project team members for resolution of project related issues
Co-ordinate with design team to deliver design as per clients' standards and specifications.
Analysis and management of project schedules from suppliers/contractors to ensure accuracy of project master schedule.
Monitor and prepare reports to management on project progress, cost and performance (incl contractors) against program and budget targets.
Ensure that project risks are identified, assessed and updated. Monitor and report to management on project risks and issues and its response plan.
Support Project Manager in arranging for the procurement of materials and external services associated with the projects.
Arrange for outages of the HV system in association with the Site Manager.
Provide advice, information, reports and submissions to achieve technical objectives.
Develop presentations on technical areas for stakeholder engagements and for internal project team.
Ensuring compliance with relevant financial requirements.
Support Project Manager in day-today contract management.
Support Site Manger with on-site inspections.
Monitor contractor performance (KPIs), prepare and issue summary status reports on contractor performance.
Assist with the development and implementation of plans to enable the effective administration of contracts.
Ensures compliance with Quality and EHS standards for all projects.
Performs according to the Company Business Conduct Guidelines and establishes a culture of trust and integrity.
Your Qualifications and Skills - Digital and Solid!

A degree in Electrical Engineering from a reputable university.
Have good knowledge, experience and understanding of design and construction of substations.
Minimum 10 years’ experience in execution of projects out of which at least 5 years of experience in execution of substation projects. Must have executed 1 project of 220kV level or higher.
Well-developed interpersonal, report writing and business reporting skills.
Good analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in MS Office
Good Proficiency in English (Verbal and Written)
Organization: Siemens Energy

Company: Siemens Pakistan Engineering Co. Ltd.

Experience Level: Experienced Professional

Job Type: Full-time

The Role: Quality Engineer II

The Team: The Quality Engineering team works in partnership with other Technology Functions and the Business to ensure quality delivery of our products. The team works in an Agile environment and is located globally. The team is independent in driving all decisions and is responsible for continuously improving customer experience, revenue growth and operations enablement through quick turn-around of development of our products with high quality.

The Impact: As QE II, you will make a significant contribution in building solutions to test applications across Web/Windows/API/Services and framing efficient data comparison methods. Your challenge will be reducing the “time to market” for products without compromising quality, by leveraging automation and innovation. You will use a wide range of technologies and have the opportunity to interact with different internal teams.

What’s In It For You
Working with a team of highly skilled, ambitious and result-oriented professionals.
Using a wide range of cutting-edge technology to innovate while testing.
An ever-challenging environment to hone your existing skills in Automation service layer testing, SQL scripting etc.
A great opportunity to think and execute like a developer while performing the role of QA.
Being a part of an organization which values ‘Culture of Urgency’ and ‘Shift Left’ approaches.
A plenty of skill building, knowledge sharing, and innovation opportunities.
Building a fulfilling career with a global financial technology company.
Responsibilities
Develop automation/performance scripts that meet organization standards and build reliable, reusable and maintainable automated regression suites & test harness
Leverage tools and frameworks to build automation/performance scripts with quality code to simplify testing scenarios
Design and develop test plans, test cases based upon functional and design specifications, execute test cases and analyze and report test results to the teams
Work in partnership with the development teams to deliver business functionality on time with required quality that meets the acceptance criteria
Focus on building efficient solutions for Web, Services/APIs, Database, mobile testing requirements.
Participate in internal/cross team meetings, project scoping, functional reviews, test specifications, technical reviews for assigned projects in an Agile environment
Participate actively in functional, system and regression testing activities
Capture quality assurance data and metrics to provide insights and conclusions
Estimate and perform risk analysis for quality delivery
What We’re Looking For
2-4 years of experience in software testing or development with good understanding of testing, coding and debugging procedures
Experience in programming using Python/C#/Java or other languages
Experience in design and development of automated tests using automation tools (e.g. Selenium, Appium) with exposure in testing across the application layers (UI/Service/Data layers/Mobile)
Experience in advising team to identify automatable test cases at different layers (UI, Services and Data layer tests). Ability to working with developers to build automation/performance friendly code is a plus.
Experience in refactoring test automation/performance suites as necessary
Experience working with SOAP and REST service and understanding of SOA architecture
Experience of SQL/PL-SQL, writing SQL queries, stored procedures and RDBMS
Exposure to Behavior Driven Development (BDD) practices and experience in Agile methodology is highly desirable
Exposure to testing in CI, DevOps, rolling deployment/upgrade model is highly desirable
Experience in developing Test Plans and Test Cases, engage in Exploratory Testing, creating and maintaining Defect Reports
Experience in performance testing tools like HP LoadRunner/Performance Center/StormRunner, JMeter.
Demonstrate ability to explain complex technical issues to both technical and non-technical audiences
Strong communication skills and ability to produce clear, concise and detailed documentation
Excellent problem solving, analytical and technical troubleshooting skills
Bachelor's or higher qualification in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent is preferred
Equal Opportunity Employer

S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.

US Candidates Only: The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law.

Job ID: 274411

Posted On: 2022-06-14

Location: Islamabad, Pakistan

Join Barrick at Reko Diq, Pakistan.

Barrick is a multinational mining company with 9 operating Gold Mines, 3 Copper Mines together with various exploration sites across the global.

Our Reko Diq Greenfields Copper project will be one of the largest Copper Mining operations in the world and we are searching for best-in-class people to join us.

This is a remote site location within the desolate areas of Balochistan.

Being Part Of The Project Team And Reporting Into The Engineering Manager - We Are Searching For a Project Engineer - Mechnical To

Lead mechanical engineering design of the Reko Diq project from feasibility through to project implementation.

Functions / Responsibilities
Management of early stage works for site establishment
Deliver supply input requirements to enable contract tender and management
Feasibility study leadership working with engineering partner for;
Design specifications review and approval
Equipment specifications and option selection
Constructability and maintainability reviews
Develop project plans, schedules and sequencing for relevant project elements to ensure proper planning of all civil related aspects of the project work
Drive value opportunities and quality review through detailed design and project implementation;
Role will report to the Engineering Manager as one of a team of engineering disciples
Skills / Qualifications
Degree in Mechanical Engineering
Experience working on project scoping and design of major infrastructure / facility projects
Experience working on major infrastructure / facility construction
Experience defining design specifications based on site conditions
Experience working in Pakistan
Barrick - becoming the world’s most valued gold and copper mining business.

Job

Capital Projects

Primary Location

Pakistan-Balochistan-Reko Diq

Unposting Date

Ongoing

Quality Engineer will be a part of project execution team BU Transmission Solution, which is responsible for execution and completion of Grid Stations projects in line with time, cost and quality requirements.

Quality Engineer will:

-Support the Project Manager (PM) in achieving project-specific quality objectives. He will plan the project-specific quality assurance measures together with the Project Manager.
-He will execute a project-specific quality assurance plan (QA plan) on the basis of the existing Quality Management (QM) system and any necessary supplements.
-Check that the quality requirements are implemented. He will take part in defining and checking processes, and if deviations from the targets are found, he derives corrective measures.
-Track the status of the project-specific quality assurance measures and any deviations from the quality management requirements
-Identify customer quality requirements, develop, and implement Method Statements, Job Safety Analysis, Inspection and test plans (ITPs)
-Ensure compliance with Quality standards for the projects. He should be familiar with ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 27001 and ISO 45001 standards
-Liaison with subcontractors particularly civil & ETC contractors, for completion of project in accordance with required specifications
-Work with Supplier Quality, Purchasing, and/or Suppliers directly to develop a strategy to ensure purchased material meets project requirements.
-Provide customer-facing support during on-site visits / audits
-Facilitate PM@Siemens project quality process and gate completion with the project team
-Conduct internal audits to support compliance to the Quality Management System (QMS)
-Actively communicate with all stakeholders including other team project teams and responsible for resolution of project related issues
be deputed in Karachi region for execution of projects
Your Qualifications and Skills – Digital and Solid!

A bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering from reputable university
3-4 years’ experience as Quality Engineer (preferably in grid station construction projects)
Good communication skills
Proficiency in MS Office
Proficiency in English (Verbal and Written)
Organization: Siemens Energy

Company: Siemens Pakistan Engineering Co. Ltd.

Experience Level: Experienced Professional

Job Type: Full-time

Shape the Future of a Growing Business with Our Team in Siemens Pakistan

We are a collection of innovative minds building the future, one day at a time. Together, we create technologies that take society further. We’re looking for people with skills and vision to build a better tomorrow.

Today, we are recruiting for Primary Design Engineer to Join Our Team in Lahore and help us re-imagine the world by finding solutions and making the world a smarter place for tomorrow.

Your Role – Challenging and Future-Oriented!

Primary Engineering and Design of HV Indoor/Outdoor, AIS/GIS Substations up to 500kV.
Equipment Layout Plan and Sections.
Control Building Layout.
Foundation and Trench Layout.
Cable Tray Layout.
Earthing and Lightning Protection Design.
Static and Dynamic Loading Calculations and Effect of Electro-Mechanical Forces in Substation.
Cable Engineering including voltage drop, ampacity, short circuit calculations and laying details.
Substation Hardware Connectors Selection and Connection Details.
Conductor and Earthing shield wire sag calculations.
Your Qualifications and Skills – Digital and Solid!

Degree in Electrical Engineering from reputable University or college
Experience (0 – 2 years).
Basic understanding of International Standards and Primary Engineering Design of HV Substations.
Proficiency in AutoCAD 2D/3D Modeling.
Proficiency in Autodesk Revit.
Analytical and critical thinking skills.
Good communication skills.
What else do you need to know?

As a world leader in developing and producing the most advanced engineering technologies, we improve lives and further human achievements worldwide, while also protecting the climate - all thanks to our employees. Working with us, you have the foundation to develop personally and professionally. We give you the chance to do something significant, that benefits society and human progress. We give you the chance to create a difference.

We are looking forward to receiving your online application.

Please note: Only complete applications can be considered in the selection process.

Organization: Siemens Energy

Company: Siemens Pakistan Engineering Co. Ltd.

Experience Level: Experienced Professional

Job Type: Full-time

See Sight Tours proudly operates in 18 cities across USA & Canada. Guests will enjoy the best of each city with complimentary downtown hotel pick-up & drop-off, fully guided & narrated tours with local guides, skip the line entry, & all paid admissions.

The Role

You Will Be Responsible For
Conducting post-release and post-implementation testing.
Executing test cases (manual or automated) and analyzing results.
Working with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the SDLC.
Reporting bugs and errors to development teams.
Monitoring and creating logs to document testing phases and defects.
Performing functional testing of features for release cycles, including creating/executing test cases, raising defects and maintaining defect logs.
Implementing QA processes, standards & controls.
Reviewing and analyzing specifications to develop effective test plans and preparing data sets for testing.
Ideal Profile
You possess a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or related field.
You have at least 1 year experience, ideally within a Quality Assurance / Testing role.
You possess strong knowledge of Javascript.
You pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standard
You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments
You possess strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical data
What's on Offer?
Work alongside & learn from best in class talent
Work within a company with a solid track record of success
Great work environment

Join Servr family and be a part new-age start-up that is a game-changer for the hospitality Industry. Servr is an all-in-one application for hotels, that provides all of the in-house services and requests, right onto the guests' phone, please visit ww.servrhotels.com for more information.

We are looking for an experienced candidate to come on as Quality Assurance Engineer and to be with us in the long run, helping grow Servr from a start-up to the world's leading Hospitality software company. At Servr, we are building a motivated and entrepreneurial team that is passionate about servr values, technology & the hospitality Industry.

Responsibilities
Assigned to a portfolio of process automation initiatives; Robotics (UI Vision, Appium & Selenium or similar platform), Process Automation focus.
Drive process automation and RPA testing best practices for the organization across projects, programs or processes.
Creation of test strategy and approach using architectural and technical implementation artifacts to derive planning and execution; also identifying risks and proposing corrective actions
Coordinate with business and other stakeholders to identify test data and test scenarios to perform end-to end execution and validation for the development’s team deliverable as per business requirements.
Coordinate with functional testing and test data management team to ensure that business processes are thoroughly validated and ready for automation.
Support prioritization of enhancements and projects via deliverable pipeline for RPA delivery teams.
Support of test data needs across the RPA program; partnering with Test Data Management (TDM) team.
Analyze and assess the impact of application changes on existing and in-flight process automations; and provide require delivery and release management support
Engage business partners to help articulate automation performance, fixes, enhancements, new releases with product quality and stability at the forefront
Approves and peer-review QA artifacts produced by QA resources within automation team. Ensures that the final work product meets all quality standards.
Maintain and enforce Quality Assurance & Engineering standards and best practices across cross-functional delivery teams
Partner closely with the Application Development Lead and Developers on code-delivery, release management, build/test cycles and defect/closure management
Support the validation of test environments and data, assessing gaps and propose mitigation controls or solutions
Maintain an awareness of evolving QA best practices and share / include best practices in RPA QA or Wealth Solutions QA practice
Support projects, programs, or processes; applies work methods to adapt to changing conditions consistent with Servr Prescribed methodologies and standards.
Perform manual and automated testing as needed; ability to code automated tests, analyze test results and ability to leverage test metrics to formulate action plans
Provide oversight for RPA Quality Assurance & Engineering function, including onboarding and training new resources, maintaining and improving QA&E processes, quality approvals, production release support and the ability to step into ad-hoc manual testing as-needed
Oversee all RPA quality project administration, test design, test execution and defect management within QAT.
Engage key business stakeholders to facilitate UAT and Business Checkout during production deployments.
Coordinates work across multiple work teams – remote/virtual/offshore environment; develops, updates, and implements contingencies for multiple teams to meet changing project or service needs. Anticipates changing resource needs and takes action to meet expectations on time and within budget.
Collaborate with application maintenance / run team and facilitate quicker resolution of issue.
Conduct and/or facilitate Root Cause Problem Solving (RCPS) discussion with other IT and business team for systematic issues identified
Other duties as assigned.
Knowledge & Experience
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a directly related field and/or equivalent work experience.
8+ years of progressively experience in IT
Extensive experience demonstrating a thorough understanding of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes
4+ years of Robotics Process Automation (UIVision, Appium, Selenium) experience
Thorough understanding of Software Development Life Cycles (i.e., Waterfall, Agile, Test Driven Development, Extreme Programming etc.)
Knowledge of Quality Assurance and testing best practices
Research and implement new quality tools, technologies, and testing processes
Ability to perform root cause analysis to Identify, isolate and track test issues throughout the software development life cycle
Practical ability to communicate, influence and persuade – both business and IT leaders as well as peers.
Hoteling Services industry experience a plus
Understanding of business process management, workflow and integration methods and tools.
Team player, facilitator and works well with others.

Posted by
Sara Zafar
サラ| PeopleOps Lead - 433 | Ex - Daraz (Alibaba) | Japan Enthusiast | Recruit | Branding
Send InMail
About Us

Daraz is South Asia's leading online shopping and selling platform present in Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Myanmar and Nepal.
In May 2018 Daraz was acquired by Alibaba Group, and we are proud to carry our part of the mission to 'make it easy to do business anywhere'. As part of the Alibaba ecosystem, we will be able to leverage Alibaba’s global leadership and experience in technology, online commerce, mobile payment and logistics to drive growth in our markets. Together with Alibaba, we are ready to empower entrepreneurs in the region and to fulfill our promise to offer our customers the best selection of products with a high level of convenience. All of this will be supported by a world leading technology platform, a strong logistics network, and a vibrant community of ecosystem participants.

What We Are Looking For

Our organization is characterized by young and smart talent with lots of energy and initiative. We are extremely performance oriented and believe in letting the best people and ideas grow - regardless of seniority. In our top management, we look for mature managers who understand how to channel this energy and who has experience in structuring work streams, processes and ideas. As part of the top management team, we expect you to adopt our philosophy of an equal balance of ‘managing’ and ‘empowering’.
Importantly, we look for someone who will live by our values that define everything we do:

Customer commitment
Teamwork
Embrace change
Integrity
Ownership

Responsibilities:

Requirement Analysis.
Working in an Agile development process.
Work closely with the QA team to identify the test scope.
Review business and QA requirements to ensure that requirements are Automatable.
Document each and every aspect of requirement and development.
Coordinate with other QA Members and Maintain Sprint and kanban Dashboard.
Produce detailed test cases based on the task requirements.
Develop and maintain the automated testing of new and old features as per requirements.

Test Execution.
Execution of functional and regression tests on mobile apps.
Perform regression Test execution.
Perform regression pre-requisite.
Prepare performance test plan and perform performance test.
Analysis of reports, Investigation on bugs, bug reporting, bug tracking, and retest defects.

Test Reporting
Provide continuous progress and feedback to the project stakeholders
Produce end of project Test reports.

Test Improvement
Work with other team members to maintain and improve the test and work environments
Work with other test team members to improve Automation processes
Suggest improvement in Automation development and teamwork processes.
Ability to take initiatives to improve Code quality.

Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related discipline.
2 years in Automated testing and quality assurance experience.
Hands-on experience with both white box and black-box testing.
Strong working knowledge of JAVA and SQL (Spring boot will be a plus).
Hands-on experience with automated testing on IOS and Android Apps Selenium, Appium(IOS and Android), Maven, TestNG, Allure, Jenkins.
Experience in developing complex features and tests.
Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus.
Experience in creating test cases for mobile and web applications.
Ability to be flexible and work analytically in a problem-solving, fast-paced collaborative environment.
Excellent written and oral communication.
Able to handle multiple projects.

What We Offer:

1. International working environment in a start-up setting, and a unique opportunity to learn from the best in e-commerce (Alibaba Group) and business growth.
2. A platform to learn from Alibaba’s world-leading ecosystem
3. Rigorous training and exposure in team management, leadership, business analytics, and operations.
4. An opportunity to train the next generation of business leaders in the ‘tech’ industry.

We are looking for a Mechanic in our Agreement Management Team to assist in Planned/Unplanned Mechanical Maintenance and troubleshooting of machinery at plant based in Faisalabad.

Your work tasks and responsibilities will include:
Supports the Maintenance Engineer in maintenance & repair activities, material requisitions, maintenance planning and scheduling.
All plant related planned maintenance and unplanned activities.
Permitting compliance with safety requirements and liaison and coordination with other departments as required.
Ensures equipment, materials and tools are on-hand for work execution.
Reports resources and time utilized, job scope expansion, rework or deferred maintenance as required.
Keeping all tasks & activities logged and updated.
Implementation of routine PM checks including vibration & temperature inspections on rotating equipment and ensuring logging or recording of all readings.
Repairs to other static equipment as required; valves, pipework, pressure vessels and tanks etc.
Tolerance measurements with accuracy of equipment under maintenance.
Supervises On-site Contractor work execution inclusive of crane rigging and lifting operations as designated.
Ensure compliance as per instructions related to implementation of Technical Bulletins and updated maintenance procedures released from time to time.

You will shine in this role if you have the following:
Educational Requirement: DAE Mechanical.
6 years of relevant industrial experience.
Mechanical Maintenance experience of HFO power plant and its auxiliaries is a must.
Prior experience of Wartsila W46 engine is an advantage.
Understanding of workplace safety.

Production Engineer is responsible to carry out, follow and develop production and maintenance activities; ensuring that the planned production program is carried out efficiently. To organize trainings of foremen, operator and technicians working on the line, to provide referral and management of employees.

Job Responsibilities
Production program; to be realized in accordance with the processes and the desired quality parameters. To keep records related to production. To keep productivity of the production and material usage of the line under constant control and to be in productivity improvement works.
Manage implementation of production program according to processes, share daily production program with foremen. Ensure application of daily, monthly, annual lubrication and maintenance programs for production line machines
Ensure that records of failures/stops for machines in production lines are kept, search for reasons and develop suggestions/projects to prevent their repetition
To plan the maintenance and lubrication of the line, to make it done to the operators, to provide the necessary records to be entered. Planning and ordering the need for spare parts. To develop the proposals / projects to prevent the repetition and to keep the failure / posture records related to the machines in the production lines and to investigate the causes of them, to provide the referral and administration of the team in case of failure, to support the employees in the determination and elimination of the failure. To make maintenance activities in accordance with planned periods and TPM plans
Ensure that all operators are trained to carry out maintenance/repair and cleaning of machines under their responsibility
Making the necessary modifications to the production line. To ensure that all operators are trained to maintain / repair and clean the machines they are responsible for. To follow the performance of the staff. To ensure the creation of a team work environment.
Perform and impose maintenance activities on planned periods and according to TPM plans.
Ensure discipline within plant, Implementation of Safety procedures at production area.
Determine and announce daily productions of production lines according to weekly program with approval from Production Manager/Operation Manager
Determine material needs according to production program.
Monitor daily production material stocks, monitoring on daily basis all production activities.
To carry out field, machine and equipment cleaning and layout controls in order to reach the target in the determined criteria. To ensure compliance with food safety and GMP rules. Ensure control and minimization of waste by acting in accordance with our Environment and Energy Management system.
Assignments by seniors.
Implementation of Quality, Food Safety and HSE management system.


Education
BSC Engineering (Electrical/Mechanical Or Equivalent)

About The Role

Job Description

The main purpose of this position is to improve the profitability of LWR through cost reduction initiatives by using a technical background, communication skills, and self-motivated efforts.

Your Responsibilities Will Include

Include but not limited to

Review production schedules, engineering specifications, process flows, and other information to understand methods and activities in manufacturing and services. Analyzes data, reports, and processes in order to improve the productivity and profitability of the operations through initiation and implementation of projects that optimize costs, efficiency, and quality. Recommends the best methods of space, manpower, material, and equipment utilization in production facilities. Determines cost effect of special requests by Engineering, Marketing, operational, and / or upper management groups. Investigates, plans, and works with other departments, such as production and quality, to carry out a cost reduction plan by analyzing and evaluating projects, developing action plans, coordinating, implementing, and following-up for results. Supports operations with worker structuring, process changes and improvements, and maximizing operation efficiencies. Assists facilities in the area of workplace safety. Relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. Performs a variety of complicated tasks. Quarterly goals and objectives reports are required, as well as detailed factory trip reports with summaries of opportunities, results of tests, and photos / diagrams. Figure out how to manufacture parts or products, or deliver services, with maximum efficiency. Enact quality control procedures to resolve production problems or minimize costs. Work with customers and management to develop standards for design and production. Reports to a Senior Engineer or Engineering manager. A wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected.

What We Will Be Looking For In You

Include but not limited to
Skills: Has wide knowledge of commonly-used concepts, practices, and procedures within the Industrial Engineering field. Familiar with a variety of the field’s concepts, practices, and procedures within the garment manufacturing field and industrial engineering.
In the case of an internal promotion, this individual will have completed the LWR Sourcing Engineering Trainee program, and has documented this.
Pary of internal communicaton and degree of difficulty:
Will need to communicate with the merchant teams and logistics teams within LWR. Difficulty arises from selling his cost reduction ideas and gaining the trust of his internal customers. Will need to communicate with subordinates to review their performance, and lend guidance. Will need to rely on leadership skills in order to translate ideas and data into action plans.
Experience 5 years
Language Proficiency: English and local language fluency in both oral and writing
Competency required:
Creativity, Critical-thinking skills Analytical skills. Math skills. Problem-solving skills. Financial Analysis

Academic Qualifications

BS in Industrial Engineering (Mandatory)

Major Subject: Industrial/Production Engineer

SPECIFIC WORKING CONDITIONS （ if any）

Include but not limited to
Frequency of Travel: 60%
External communication required: 50%
Major Challenges for this role:
Optimize manufacturing cost by improve the method and motion in Manufacturing and secure capacity for LWR products. Reduce freight cost per piece across all coalitions by utilizing your technical knowledge to improve container utilization, packing densities, and carton utilization. Work with the merchant teams to reduce FOB pricing by identifying cost reduction opportunities in the areas of thread, fabric, trims, packaging materials, and garment construction. Follow up with opportunities identified and help the merchant teams with implementation of the same. Work directly or indirectly with manufacturers in order to improve efficiencies, productivity, quality, and meet delivery dates. Help manufacturers reduce manufacturing cycle time and improve Speed to Market.

We are hiring for Nishat Chunian Power Ltd (NCPL), a 200MW IPP and one of the leading power plants in Pakistan.

What you need to know about us
Nishat Chunian Group (NCG) excels in the textile and power sectors of Pakistan. With annual sales of Rs. 49.284 billion in FY 2021, Nishat Chunian Limited is ranked fifth amongst the textile companies in Pakistan. NCG prides itself on being an innovative and forward-thinking company and we value honesty, commitment, passion and innovation at our workplace.

What your typical day will look like
Coordinate and supervise all maintenance functions necessary to ensure the efficient and reliable operation of the plant to meet scheduled production level
Schedule all maintenance activities with plant personnel and outside service providers
Maintain and enforce safety procedures, including all lockout/tagout and safe work procedures
Develop and direct implementation of maintenance procedures and plans to assure optimum efficiency and effectiveness in outage planning, giving consideration to equipment capabilities and equipment maintenance requirements.
Schedule materials, equipment and personnel for plant activities and maintain needed site spare parts.

What you need to succeed at this role
BSc Engr. Mechanical/Marine Engineer with 10 - 15 years’ experience in maintenance of power plants above 100 MW including hands on experience of maintenance and trouble shooting
Relevant experience of IPP having HFO based engines and steam turbine
Strong PPA understanding with excellent analytical, troubleshooting and leadership skills
A multi-dimensional individual willing to take additional roles
Experience on Wartsila 18V46 Engines and steam turbine on same position will be preferred

You’re user-focused, passionate, scrappy, solutions-focused, and innovative.

knowledge, skills, and abilities needed

About Quixel

Quixel is the creator of Megascans, Bridge, and Mixer: the world’s largest library of 3D scans and two groundbreaking art applications. Our products standardize and accelerate workflows within the entire 3D industry and empower all artists to take control of their creative passions.

We work with industry leaders in 3D art and have been integral to some of today’s biggest AAA games and blockbuster movies. We are also rapidly expanding into architectural visualization and product design spaces.

We hire creative, passionate people, and give them the autonomy to do great work. We are building Quixel to be a remarkable place to work, learn, and grow. We are growing fast and would love to work with you!

Quixel is proud to be an equal opportunity, non-discrimination and harassment free workplace. A diverse workforce with varied perspective and background strengthens us by creating and environment receptive to new ideas, alteration and innovation.
